did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.
did.abstract: The collection consists of biographical information, postcards, watercolor photographs, and architectural drawings for projects mostly in Germany.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from the Eva Kruger Architectural Collection must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Eva Kruger Architectural Collection, Ms2000-098, Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The Eva Kruger Architectural Collection was donated to Special Collections through multiple accessions in 2000- 2002.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement and description of the Eva Marianne Kruger Architectural Collection commenced in 2000. The collection was encoded in August, 2010.

bioghist.head: Biographical Information
bioghist.p: Eva Marianne Kruger was born in Berlin, Germany in 1922 and earned her architecture degree from the Technische Hochschule Charlottenburg in 1950. She worked as an architect in Germany until the mid 1960's when she then turned her focus to a career in art.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of one box with curriculum vitae, thesis project, postcards, watercolor photographs, a bound notebook, and 9 folders of architectural drawings of residences and hotels.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is arranged by material type.
